location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and much of the address of the letter has been obscured. However, it is still possible to make out the name of the intended recipient.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a letter received dated 15 July 1808. In the letter the Resident at Bushire conveys gratitude for congratulations sent to him by the Resident at Bussora [Basra] for his safe arrival at Bushire.
